sentence.Network_en: Police said permission for the march had not been granted.
sentence.Network_cn: 警方说游行并未得到批准。

sentence.Network_en: They had asked Hong Kong for permission to put into port there.
sentence.Network_cn: 他们请求香港允许他们在那里入港停留。

sentence.Network_en: He got permission from his commanding officer to join me.
sentence.Network_cn: 他得到指挥官的许可来与我会合。

PerfectNetExp.abs: 人教版九年级上册英语单词表 ... confident 自信的 permission 许可 herself 她自己.
...器在你要修改权限的文件（软件）名上长按，出现修改权限（permissions），第1247项打勾也叫211权限在第一行上选前两个第 …
值得注意的是，情态助动词都有“推测“和“非推测“两种意义，如may就有“允许“（非推测）和“可能“（推测）两种含义；will也有“意志“（非推测）和“预测“（推测）两种含义。can/could，may/might表示“允许（permission）“（非推测）和“可能（possibility）、能力（ability）“（推测性）两种含义。must.
高中英语新课程标准词汇表 ... period n. 时期，时代 permission n. 允许，许可，同意 permit vt. 许可，允许；执照.

htc 手机最详细的Recovery使用说明-优机网 ... --show log 显示日志 --Fix Permissions 修复权限 --reboot system now 重启系统.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: from Latin permissio(n-), from the verb permittere 'allow' (see permit)

entry.def: If someone who has authority over you gives you permission to do something, they say that they will allow you to do it.

example.ex: He asked permission to leave the room...
Finally his mother relented and gave permission for her youngest son to marry...
example.tran: 最后他母亲让步了,准许她的小儿子结婚。

entry.def: A permission is a formal, written statement from an official group or place allowing you to do something.

means.word_mean: 2. the act of giving a formal (usually written) authorization

auth_sentence.content: The company already has permission for a smaller build.
auth_sentence.res_content: The company already has permission for a smaller build.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The company already has permission for a smaller build.

auth_sentence.content: You must have their permission to enter this competition.
auth_sentence.res_content: You must have their permission to enter this competition.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: You must have their permission to enter this competition.

auth_sentence.content: It was as if he were asking our permission.
auth_sentence.res_content: It was as if he were asking our permission.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: It was as if he were asking our permission.

e出+miss送,放出+ion表名词→送出去

Sentence.sentence: But critics allege that by making electronic copies of these books without first seeking the permission of copyright holders, Google has committed piracy.

means.word_mean: 允许, 许可, 准许,批准

sentences.en: Did he give you permission to take that?
sentences.cn: 他允许你拿那个东西了吗?

sentences.en: I have obtained a written permission from the chairman.
sentences.cn: 我从主席那里获得了书面许可。

sentences.en: With your permission I'll leave now.
sentences.cn: 有你的允许, 我这就离开。

sentences.en: The article was reproduced by the special permission of the President.
sentences.cn: 由于总统的特殊允许, 这篇文章被复印了一份。

jushi.english: With your permission I'll leave now.
jushi.chinese: 有你的允许,我可以离开了。

jushi.english: I have obtained a written permission from the chairman.
jushi.chinese: 我从主席那里获得了书面许可。

jushi.english: The article was reproduced by the special permission of the President.
jushi.chinese: 由于总统的特殊允许,这篇文章被复印了一份。
